title: Preperations and Management
introduction: Preparation and management are pivotal to a project's success. They ensure clear objectives, efficient resource allocation, and anticipation of challenges. Proper preparation sets the stage for smooth execution, while effective management keeps the project on course and ensures quality outcomes.

title: Orientation and Concepting
introduction: Orientation and concepting anchor a project's direction and vision. By thoroughly understanding the problem statement, we ensure relevant solutions. Defining the concept provides a clear roadmap for development. Together, they guide a project from vague ideas to focused strategies, ensuring alignment with goals and audience needs.

title: UI Design
introduction: A good user interface is key to a good user experience. With this project phase, the concept visually comes to live and starts to function as close to a real product as possible.

title: Development
introduction: In the development phase, a functional product is built including all necessary preparations like software architecture and setting up the development environment etc.

title: Personal Development and Reflections
introduction: Personal development drives professional evolution. This semester, I honed my communication skills and delved into the realm of artificial intelligence, recognizing its potential for my role as a designer and developer. This growth not only enhances my capabilities but also broadens my contributions to the dynamic intersection of development and design.

title: Presentations and Meetings
introduction: Presentations and meetings are the core of communication during any project. Below is an overview of the meetings and presentations for this semester.
